overview: Berenice is a girl whose beauty is sometimes  confuses you with your joy of living.  Your place  favorite is the field where she runs with a wide  smile on your face.  Aegean, depressed and with a  weak health lives in the mansion's office  of your family.  Your relationship with the world  occurs through the books that decorate your  library.  From the meeting between these two  unhealthy fixation is born.  Free adaptation  tion of the homonymous tale by Edgar Allan Poe
title: Berenice
